/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of gray and brown, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. Their windows reflect the sunlight, adding a touch of warmth to the otherwise cool color palette. The trees, lush and green, provide a natural contrast to the urban architecture. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a soft glow.
